thread.title: Delta June traffic up, passenger revenue down

title: Delta June traffic up, passenger revenue down
text:
Delta June traffic up, passenger revenue down Aug 4, 2015, 10:07am EDT Industries & Tags Delta Air Lines Inc. Delta Comfort+ offers an upgraded experience on all two cabin aircraft around the world. Delta Air Lines Inc. (NYSE: DAL) reported Tuesday its total system traffic rose 4.2 percent in July thanks to domestic performance. Domestic traffic was up 5.3 percent, while international traffic was up 3.8 percent. Its number of passengers in June jumped 5.3 percent to 17,103,337. However, consolidated passenger unit revenue was down 3 percent due to pressure from foreign exchange, lower surcharges in international markets and continued yield pressure in select domestic markets.
